title: Is USPS Locking Mailboxes To Undermine 2020 Election?
subtitle: Mailbox rumors swirled in 2020, as did real concern about the U.S. Postal Service's ability to meet demand before the general election.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The U.S. Postal Service placed locks on mailboxes to prevent voters from casting mail-in ballots in the 2020 presidential election.
